code: import{Api_signIn,Api_register,Api_Todo,getAuthToken}from'./constants.js';export var LoginApi=function LoginApi(user){return fetch(Api_signIn,{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({user:user})});};export var RegisterApi=function RegisterApi(user){return fetch(Api_register,{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({user:user})});};export var GetTodosApi=function GetTodosApi(){return fetch(Api_Todo,{method:'GET',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:getAuthToken()}});};export var AddTodoApi=function AddTodoApi(todo){return fetch(Api_Todo,{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:getAuthToken()},body:JSON.stringify({todo:todo})});};export var deleteTodoApi=function deleteTodoApi(id){return fetch("".concat(Api_Todo,"/").concat(id),{method:'DELETE',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:getAuthToken()}});};export var toggleTodoApi=function toggleTodoApi(id){return fetch("".concat(Api_Todo,"/").concat(id,"/toggle"),{method:'PATCH',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:getAuthToken()}});};
